languages.text: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.

traits.locale_text: The target suffers double the Ignite psychic power damage and half the fire damage of all the burning creatures within the line of sight of the target.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает двойной урон от психосилы Воспламенение и половину огненного урона от всех существ с эффектами горения в своей зоне видимости.
Цель получает двойной урон от психосилы Воспламенение и половину огненного урона от всех существ с эффектами горения в своей зоне видимости.

languages.text: 对目标造成火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害等同于{g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}星火燎原{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}伤害的两倍。此外，目标{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内所有处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态的生物，都会受到一半的{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.

traits.locale_text: 对目标造成火焰伤害，伤害等同于星火燎原灵能伤害的两倍。此外，目标{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内所有处于“燃烧”状态的生物，都会受到一半的火焰伤害。

languages.text: El objetivo sufre el doble del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por el {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignición{/g} y la mitad del {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} de todas las criaturas que estén {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g} dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del objetivo.
languages.original_text: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo sufre el doble del daño causado por el poder psíquico Ignición y la mitad del daño por fuego de todas las criaturas que estén ardiendo dentro de la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del objetivo.

languages.text: Das Ziel erleidet den doppelten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Entzünden{/g} und die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschadens{/g} aller {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Kreaturen im Umkreis von {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Ziels.
languages.original_text: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erleidet den doppelten Schaden der psionischen Kraft Entzünden und die Hälfte des Feuerschadens aller brennenden Kreaturen im Umkreis von {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} des Ziels.

languages.text: La cible subit le double des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par le {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Enflammer{/g} et la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} de toutes les créatures en {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}combustion{/g} présentes dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target suffers double the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} and half the {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} of all the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} creatures within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} of the target.

traits.locale_text: La cible subit le double des dégâts infligés par le pouvoir psychique Enflammer et la moitié des dégâts de feu de toutes les créatures en combustion présentes dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットは発火の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}で2倍の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、その{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}している生物の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}の半分を受ける。

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは発火の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}で2倍の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、その{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}している生物の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}の半分を受ける。
